UUC.name: Universal Utility Conduit
UUC.description: Provides all the utility connections required by other structures such as power, water, sewage, and transportation tunneling.  Building another structure always includes this structure underneath.  By itself it offers a cheap way to connect parts of the colony.
UUC.constructionResourcesDescription: resource consumed and required for construction.
UUC.operatingResourcesDescription: resources required for the structure to operate.  If structure not operational during a tick, then it produces nothing.
UUC.consumingResourcesDescription: Some resources are lost or used by the structure every tick.

Power.name: Power Station
Power.description: Provides power to connected structures.  A structure is connected to a power station by being next to a station or via other undamaged structures.  Structures can become isolated and stop providing their life sustaining products such as food, water, shelter, etc.
Power.constructionResourcesDescription: resource consumed and required for construction.
Power.operatingResourcesDescription: resources required for the structure to operate.  If structure not operational during a tick, then it produces nothing.
Power.consumingResourcesDescription: Some resources are lost or used by the structure every tick.

Agriculture.name: Agriculture Pod
Agriculture.description: Provides food, wood and plant fibers.  People need food to live, so the number of pods affects how large a population the colony can sustain.  However, the population can withstand periods with less than optimal sustenance.

Residential.description: Provides shelter.  While a population needs shelter, they can make do with overcrowding to an extent.  However, severe overcrowding promotes more disease and morbidity.
